description: On this episode of PIGS, we look in on a surveillance assignment with undercover detectives Cody Cummings and Johnny Torque. Typical protocol calls for a lot of downtime, but Cummings & Torque are good cops who know how to help each other out during the slow, long, hard hours on the grind. Nothing too out of the ordinary here. Just a regular day on the job. Eat some doughnuts on the tax payer's dime, read the paper, suck off your partner and let him cum all over your face. You know, just a day in the life of your typical officer.Enjoy!
title: Pigs
